channel.title: Cédric Ho Thanh on Cédric HT
channel.description: Recent content in Cédric Ho Thanh on Cédric HT

item.title: About me
item.description: I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at Prof. Takemasa Miyoshi’s Prediction Science Laboratory, RIKEN Cluster for Pioneering Research, in the Medical Data Deep Learning Team, headed by Dr. Jun Seita. I am also a member of the RIKEN Quantum group. I obtained my PhD in mathematics from Paris University, France, in October 2020, where I was a student at the Research Institute for Foundations of Computer Science (IRIF), under the supervision of Pierre-Louis Curien (IRIF) and Samuel Mimram (LIX, École Polytechnique).

item.title: Contact
item.description: eMail cedric.hothanh [At sign] riken [ccTLD of Japan] Address Nihonbashi 1-chome Mitsui Building, 15th floor, 1-4-1 Nihonbashi, Chuo-ku, Tokyo 103-0027, Japan or 〒 103-0027 東京都 中央区日 本橋 1-4-1 日本橋一丁目 三井ビルディング 15 階

item.title: Research
item.description: Articles and preprints Trust your neighbours: Handling noise in multi-objective optimisation using kNN-averaging, 2023, with Stefan Klikovits, Ahmet Cetinkaya, and Paolo Arcaini. In Applied Soft Computing Topological recurrence theorems for infinitary probabilistic model checking, 2022, with Natsuki Urabe and Ichiro Hasuo. Frenetic at the SBST 2021 tool competition, 2021, with Ezequiel Castellano, Ahmet Cetinkaya, Stefan Klikovits, Xiaoyi Zhang, and Paolo Arcaini. In IEEE/ACM 14th International Workshop on Search-Based Software Testing (SBST).

item.title: Stuff'n things
item.description: Projects Turbo Broccoli: A Python package containing JSON (de)serialization extensions. It makes it possible to embed bytes, numpy arrays, keras models, etc. in a dict and seemlessly pass it on to json.dump, and conversely, reconstruct these objects using json.load. kappak: My LaTeX package. It regroups functionalities I find useful, from general style of LaTeX documents (title page, chapter style, header / footer, …), to more specific math related commands (theorem environments, commutative diagrams, …).

item.title: Teaching
